resources.string: Your phone is compatible with MeshAndroid.
Sorry, but your phone is not supported. :(
Welcome to Mesh. With this App, you can create your own network between different phones. [â€¦]
This App requires root access. Please make sure your phone is rooted. Click the button below to test if the app can execute commands as root.

In order to create a connection to other devices successfully,

 - the network name, frequency and BSSID on all devices must be the same
 - the IP address must be unique for each device

 We tried to generate good default values below, you can change them on the settings page if needed.
